column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Liz - Thanks for your review. In the coming weeks
column2: we'll have another vegetarian option called Spicy Creamy Vegan Ramen
column3: which is vastly different than our Vegetable Soup Ramen. And it's definitely a crowd favorite at some of the other JINYA locations around the country. Thank you for trying us out
column4: and we hope to serve you again soon.
